Driving Directions

From Lake Shore Drive

North

Going south on Lake Shore Dr. exit at Michigan Avenue and get into the far right lane. Turn right at Walton Street. The entrance to the Self Park 900 N. Michigan Ave garage will be on your left. Park on the Delaware side of the garage and take the elevators to the 14th floor.

South

Going north on Lake Shore Drive, exit on Chicago Avenue. Head straight until your reach Rush street and turn right. After passing Delaware Place, the entrance to the Self Park 900 N. Michigan Ave garage will be on your right. Park on the Delaware side of the garage and take the elevators to the 14th floor. Turn right on Delaware Place if getting dropped off, the building will be on your left.

From the Kennedy

ake the Kennedy expressway to the Ohio exit. Turn left on Rust Street. After passing Delaware Place, the entrance to the Self Park 900 N. Michigan Ave garage will be on your right. Remember to take a photo of the floor you parked on before getting in the elevator. Turn right on Delaware Place if getting dropped off, the building will be on your left.

*Valet parking is available on Delaware Place and Earnst Court.
